title: Interior Compiler Error

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
For this source code I get an internal compiler error. I don't have a debug version of Rust so the stack backtrace is only mildly useful. I am using thestinger's 64bit Arch package at commit 776c17f47. If necessary, I can compile a debug version.

``` rust
use std::mem::{transmute, size_of};

pub fn as_raw_bytes<'a, T>(obj: &'a T) -> &'a [u8] {
    unsafe {
        transmute(Slice{
            data: transmute(obj),
            len: size_of::<T>()
        })
    }
}
```
